name: Imgurious
body:
# Imgurious
Imgurious is an imgur client for the web utilizing aggressive server-side caching for efficient, scalable use as a proxy of the site's assets.

## Dependencies
- Java >= 1.6
- [Conscript](https://github.com/n8han/conscript)
- [giter8](https://github.com/n8han/giter8/)

## Build & Run
Run the Scala Build Tool with the following.

```sh
$ ./sbt.sh
```

Then, from within its interactive shell, run the following.

```sh
$ ./sbt.sh
> ~;container:start; container:reload /
```

## Source
The main classes are located at `/src/main/scala/com/mattneary/imget`.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
